violations.description: Ensure that content is not hidden using visual styling only
violations.help: Content hidden visually must also be hidden from screen readers

any.message: Element is visually hidden but exposed to screen readers

nodes.html: This text is visually hidden but accessible to screen readers.
target: div[style="position: absolute; left: -9999px; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;"]
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element is visually hidden but exposed to screen readers
